name: gas-kv-memory
description: GoogleAppsScriptで使用できる軽量な外部KVストレージ（Cloudflare Workers + KV）

scripts.typecheck: npm --workspace=packages/core run typecheck && npm --workspace=packages/gas-client run typecheck
scripts.install-all: npm install && npm --workspace=packages/core install && npm --workspace=packages/gas-client install
